# monoStereoAndMultichannel

**Type Property**

A value that indicates the player item supports mono, stereo, and multichannel layouts for audio spatialization.

## Declaration

```swift
static var monoStereoAndMultichannel: AVAudioSpatializationFormats { get }
```

## Spatialization formats

- **monoAndStereo**: A value that indicates the player item only supports mono and stereo layouts for audio spatialization.
- **multichannel**: A value that indicates the player item only supports multichannel layouts for audio spatialization.

items.description: A value that indicates the player item only supports mono and stereo layouts for audio spatialization.
items.name: monoAndStereo

items.description: A value that indicates the player item only supports multichannel layouts for audio spatialization.
items.name: multichannel
